short_summary: The government of Canada is seeking proposals for the development of photon counting spectral detectors for application in spectral LIDAR located in Valcartier, Quèbec, Canada. The proposal must be submitted before 2 PM EST on 20 February 2023.
description: The acquisition of R&D services in the development of detectors having a large dynamic range and operates in photon counting mode for application in spectral LIDAR located in Valcartier, Quèbec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
